basicInfo.name: Evan
basicInfo.flavor: Evan was bestowed with the title of Imperator as he set out on his expedition to thwart Kris and the lich Bane's plan to invade Terra.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense.

Skill 1.name: Swift Strikes
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack plus 165% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Stun duration becomes 4 turn(s).
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack plus 200% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 100%.

Skill 2.name: Shield of Order
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 110% of the caster's Defense. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 130% of Defense.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 21% Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Unbending Will
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Stun Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Stun Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Boost to 18%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Karin, Rudy, Evan Expedition, order, justice, diligence, adventure, training
profile.story: Evan was bestowed with the title of Imperator as he set out on his expedition to thwart Kris and the lich Bane's plan to invade Terra.

basicInfo.name: Evan
basicInfo.flavor: Evan was honored with the title of Commandant by Rudy for his crucial role in defending Mystic Woods from Knox.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Swift Strikes
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack plus 150% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 150% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Shield of Order
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 100% of the caster's Defense. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Unbending Will
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Stun Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Stun Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 11%.

basicInfo.name: Evan
basicInfo.flavor: Evan is the grandson of a retired general of Terra Kingdom. He plans to leave on an adventure to find the owner of his necklace according to the wishes of his late grandfather.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Swift Strikes
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack plus 135% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 70% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 135% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Shield of Order
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 90% of the caster's Defense. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Unbending Will
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Stun Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Stun Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 8%.
